title: How to Quickly Delete Calls from Your Android Phone

steps.title: Open the Phone app.
steps.content: Open the Phone app. It's the green phone icon typically found at the bottom-left corner of the home screen. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Select the Recents tab.
steps.content: Select the Recents tab. It’s at the bottom of the screen. This will display your call history. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap ⁝ or More.
steps.content: Tap ⁝ or More . It's at the top-right corner of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Delete.
steps.content: Tap Delete . You'll see boxes next to each of the calls in the list. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Select the calls you want to delete.
steps.content: Select the calls you want to delete. Tap the box to delete that call. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Delete.
steps.content: Tap Delete . The call history is now deleted.

steps.title: Use the All checkbox to delete all calls.
steps.content: Use the All checkbox to delete all calls. You’ll see this checkbox at the top of the list of calls. Tap it to select all the calls in your history, then tap Delete .

steps.title: Open the Phone app.
steps.content: Open the Phone app. It's the blue circle with a white phone receiver inside. It's typically located at the bottom of the home screen. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the clock icon.
steps.content: Tap the clock icon. This displays your most recent calls. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Tap ⁝.
steps.content: Tap ⁝ . It's at the top-right corner of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Call History.
steps.content: Tap Call History . This displays all in- and out-bound calls. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Tap ⁝.
steps.content: Tap ⁝ .

steps.title: Tap Clear call history.
steps.content: Tap Clear call history . [8] X Research source

steps.title: Tap OK to confirm.
steps.content: Tap OK to confirm.

steps.title: Delete individual call logs from the Recents menu.
steps.content: Delete individual call logs from the Recents menu. If you don’t want to clear your entire call history, you can also delete individual call logs. To do this, open the phone app, then: Tap the clock icon to open the Recents menu. Tap a number or contact in your call log. Tap Call Details . Tap the Trash icon at the top of the menu.

steps.title: Open the Phone app.
steps.content: Open the Phone app. It's the phone receiver icon typically found at the bottom of the home screen.

steps.title: Tap Call logs.
steps.content: Tap Call logs . [9] X Research source

steps.title: Tap ....
steps.content: Tap ... . If you're using an older device, press the Menu button at the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Clear all.
steps.content: Tap Clear all . If you want to select all calls for deletion, tap the Clear All button.

steps.title: Tap Clear to select individual calls for deletion.
steps.content: Tap Clear to select individual calls for deletion. If you’d rather delete individual calls, tap the Clear button. This will allow you to select one or more calls instead of the entire list.

steps.title: Tap Yes to confirm.
steps.content: Tap Yes to confirm. Whether you select all calls or just a few, tap Yes to confirm your choice and delete the calls.

steps.title: Open the Phone app.
steps.content: Open the Phone app. It's the phone receiver icon on your home screen. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Swipe to the Recents tab.
steps.content: Swipe to the Recents tab. This tab shows an icon of a clock.

steps.title: Tap ⁝.
steps.content: Tap ⁝ .

steps.title: Select Call history.
steps.content: Select Call history .

steps.title: Tap ⁝ > Clear call history.
steps.content: Tap ⁝ > Clear call history . This will clear your entire call history. To confirm, tap OK .

steps.title: Select individual calls if you don’t want to clear all calls.
steps.content: Select individual calls if you don’t want to clear all calls. If you don’t want to clear your entire call history, you can delete individual calls. Select the number or contact name for the call you want to delete, then tap the Information button (it looks like a circle with an i inside). Tap the Trash icon to delete the call.
